Assalamualaikum and Salam Sejahtera,

All students are cordially invited to attend a webinar which is scheduled as follows:

Speaker: Prof. Dr. Yanhua Luo  
Affiliation: Shanghai University, China  
Title: The Development of Fiber Optic Sensors Based on 3D Printing Fiber Technology  
Date: 30 April 2024 (Tuesday)  
Time: 2.30 PM – 3.30 PM  
Webex Meeting Link: [LINK](https://utm.webex.com/utm/j.php?MTID=ma429b2a62f23f6793a543429ec925390)
  
Meeting number: 2514 236 5888  
Meeting password: TGt87V9k7jm

PG student’s attendance is counted to fulfill the faculty’s requirement.
